description.message: 审查探测 notifies you when something you post on Weibo might be controversial or taken down. Keep your online identity clean using 审查探测.

shortDescription.message: Get a notification whenever you post a Weibo that might be censored.
shortDescription.description: The short description of the extension.

warningNotificationTitle.description: The title of the warning notification.

warningNotificationContent.message: The Weibo you just posted is potentially controversial.
warningNotificationContent.description: The content of the warning notification.

historyButton.description: The label of the button that links to the controversial posts history.

historyEmpty.message: You have not recently posted any controversial Weibos.
historyEmpty.description: The message shown when the history is empty.

clearHistory.description: The label of the button that clears the user's history.

updateNotificationTitle.description: The title of the notification that notifies the user that an update is available.

updateNotificationContent.message: An update is available for 审查探测. Click here to download.

updateButton.description: Content of the update notification in the popup.
